channel.title: Why do I keep losing my connection?! Please help
channel.description: ^ Topic, I can't seem to log onto ANY server. But sometimes I get lucky and get into a server, but then 10 minutes later, I lose my connection and lag out. Any tips on getting on and staying on servers? Thanks in advance.

item.title: Why do I keep losing my connection?! Please help
item.dc:creator: @Du_Thelduin Du Thelduin
item.description:
@Du_Thelduin wrote:

Umm… get a better internert connection

Make sure all (if not most) programs are closed when you do this, it helps reduce lag.

Read full topic
item.source: Why do I keep losing my connection?! Please help
